items.sentence: We\'ve considered your proposal, and we\'ve decided that we aren\'t able to reduce the price.
My friend over there is really shy, but he thinks you\'re cute and he\'d like to talk to you.
Even though my friend was a vegetarian, I didn\'t tell him that the soup had some meat in it.
It\'s not right for you to do something bad just because someone else has done something bad.
One thing Tom does that isn\'t very safe is that he uses the same password for every website.
